schemas.description: Sloan Digital Sky Survey Data Release 12

tables.description: Contains data from a given plate used for spectroscopic observations.
Contains the measured parameters for a spectrum.
A subset of specobjall that just has the clean spectra. The subset excludes QA and Sky and duplicates. Use this as the main way to access the spectro objects.
A view of specobjall that includes only SEGUE-1+SEGUE-2 spectra.
A view of specobjall that includes only SEGUE-1 spectra.
A view of specobjall that includes only SEGUE-2 spectra.
The full photometric catalog quantities for SDSS imaging.
A join table linking the spectra in dr12q to other observations of the same object.
Emission line kinematics results for SDSS and BOSS galaxies using GANDALF.
Estimated stellar masses for SDSS and BOSS galaxies using the Wisconsin PCA technique.
Estimated stellar masses for SDSS and BOSS galaxies (Portsmouth method).
Estimated stellar masses for SDSS and BOSS galaxies (Granada method).
